title: NCREC Leandro Bortolon: Resilience of Cropping Systems

tasks.task: Discuss methods to improve cropping system resilience in North Dakota.
subtasks: Explain the challenges faced during the cropping season due to drought.
Recommend increasing organic matter through reduced tillage and no-till farming.
Highlight the benefits of cover crops in improving soil structure and water storage.
Advise against planting too deep (e.g., more than 3 inches) to avoid soil crusting issues.
Address problems caused by speeding up planting, which can lead to soil crusting.
Promote the inclusion of cover crops in rotation schemes for long-term benefits.
